get_default_device[source]

get_default_device(use_cuda=None)

Return or set default device; use_cuda: None - CUDA if available; True - error if not availabe; False - CPU

requires_grad(m)

init_default[source]

init_default(m, func='kaiming_normal_')

Initialize m weights with func and set bias to 0.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cond_init[source]

cond_init(m, func)

Apply init_default to m unless it's a batchnorm module

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

apply_leaf[source]

apply_leaf(m, f)

Apply f to children of m.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

apply_init[source]

apply_init(m, func='kaiming_normal_')

Initialize all non-batchnorm layers of m with func.
